params.addr: Address to query (can be UEA or native Push Chain EOA)

returns.account: Universal account information containing origin details
returns.isUEA: True if address is a UEA (cross-chain), false if native Push Chain EOA

getOriginForUEA(address).notice: Get origin information for any address on Push Chain
